languages.text: If the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is equal to or less than 0 when the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} makes this attack, the target will suffer an additional +<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the Bounty Hunter's attacks until the end of the combat. Stacks.
languages.original_text: Если в момент, когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}охотник за головами{/g} совершает эту атаку, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броня{/g} цели меньше или равна 0, то до конца боя эта цель будет получать +<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}ВОС{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} от атак охотника за головами дополнительно. Эффект суммируется.

traits.locale_text: If the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is equal to or less than 0 when the Hunter makes this attack, the target will suffer an additional +<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% damage from the Hunter's attacks until the end of the combat. Stacks.

If the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is equal to or less than 0 when the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} makes this attack, the target will suffer an additional +<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the Bounty Hunter's attacks until the end of the combat. Stacks.

If the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is equal to or less than 0 when the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} makes this attack, the target will suffer an additional +<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the Bounty Hunter's attacks until the end of the combat. Stacks.

languages.text: 如果{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}赏金猎人{/g}此次攻击时，目标的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}等于或小于0，则赏金猎人所有攻击对该目标造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}都会提高<u>（5×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>%，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果可叠加。
languages.original_text: If the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is equal to or less than 0 when the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} makes this attack, the target will suffer an additional +<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the Bounty Hunter's attacks until the end of the combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 如果{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}赏金猎人{/g}此次攻击时，目标的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}等于或小于0，则赏金猎人所有攻击对该目标造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}都会提高<u>（5×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>%，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果可叠加。

languages.text: Si la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} del objetivo es igual o inferior a 0 cuando el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}cazarrecompensas{/g} ataque, el objetivo sufre un +<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g})</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional de los ataques del cazarrecompensas hasta el fin del combate. Este efecto es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: If the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is equal to or less than 0 when the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} makes this attack, the target will suffer an additional +<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the Bounty Hunter's attacks until the end of the combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Si la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} del objetivo es igual o inferior a 0 cuando el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}cazarrecompensas{/g} ataque, el objetivo sufre un +<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g})</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional de los ataques del cazarrecompensas hasta el fin del combate. Este efecto es acumulativo.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}バウンティハンター{/g}がこの攻撃を行う時点でターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}が0以下の場合、ターゲットは+<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>%の追加{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}をハンターの攻撃時から戦闘終了まで受ける。スタックする。
languages.original_text: If the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is equal to or less than 0 when the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} makes this attack, the target will suffer an additional +<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the Bounty Hunter's attacks until the end of the combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: ハンターがこの攻撃を行う時点でターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}が0以下の場合、ターゲットは+<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>%の追加ダメージをハンターの攻撃時から戦闘終了まで受ける。スタックする。

languages.text: Если в момент, когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}охотник за головами{/g} совершает эту атаку, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броня{/g} цели меньше или равна 0, то до конца боя эта цель будет получать +<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}ВОС{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} от атак охотника за головами дополнительно. Эффект суммируется.
languages.original_text: If the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is equal to or less than 0 when the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} makes this attack, the target will suffer an additional +<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the Bounty Hunter's attacks until the end of the combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Если в момент, когда охотник совершает эту атаку, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броня{/g} цели меньше или равна 0, то до конца боя эта цель будет получать +<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}ВОС{/g})</u>% урона от атак охотника дополнительно. Эффект суммируется.

Если в момент, когда охотник совершает эту атаку, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броня{/g} цели меньше или равна 0, то до конца боя эта цель будет получать +<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}ВОС{/g})</u>% урона от атак охотника дополнительно. Эффект суммируется.

languages.text: Wenn die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} des Ziels gleich oder kleiner als 0 ist, wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Kopfgeldjäger{/g} seinen Angriff ausführt, erleidet das Ziel bis zum Ende des Kampfes zusätzlich +<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}WAH{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} durch die Angriffe des Kopfgeldjägers. Stapelbar.
languages.original_text: If the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is equal to or less than 0 when the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} makes this attack, the target will suffer an additional +<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the Bounty Hunter's attacks until the end of the combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Wenn die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} des Ziels gleich oder kleiner als 0 ist, wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Kopfgeldjäger{/g} seinen Angriff ausführt, erleidet das Ziel bis zum Ende des Kampfes zusätzlich +<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}WAH{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} durch die Angriffe des Kopfgeldjägers. Stapelbar.

languages.text: Si l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de la cible est inférieure ou égale à 0 lorsque le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}chasseur de primes{/g} lance cette attaque, toutes ses attaques infligent +<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g})</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires à la cible jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable.
languages.original_text: If the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is equal to or less than 0 when the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} makes this attack, the target will suffer an additional +<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the Bounty Hunter's attacks until the end of the combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Si l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de la cible est inférieure ou égale à 0 lorsque le Chasseur lance cette attaque, toutes les attaques de celui-ci infligent +<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g})</u> % de dégâts supplémentaires à la cible jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable.
